page.title: 20A CHILD'S LIFE IN DUNVANT
page.content: My name is Jonathan and I am 11 years old.This morning I woke up about 7am..It was too early to get up so I read a book called 'The Phantom Freighter'.Later I got up and had a breakfast of porridge and toast.At 8.45 I went to school which starts at 9.15.When I got to school I went for a swimming lesson.Later I had a dinner of chicken and chips.Afterwards I did some mathematics then we had games, playing rugby and football.The school day ends at 3-45pm.When I got home I watched television.I like watching a comedy called 'Full House' and a quiz programme called 'Block Busters'.About 5.30 my Dad arrived home from Swansea University where he works and then we had tea consisting of spaghetti on toast.Later I went to bed and read for about half an hour before going to sleep.
